column2: US Department of Education Ensure Koba\u00efan is taught in public schools
column5: Kobaïan was the language of the settlers on the now extinct planet of Kobaïa. Although the expedition turned out to be a total failure,,,Please take action to ensure that the dying language of Koba\u00efan is saved by being taught in public schools to the upcoming generation. Koba\u00efan is at grave risk of becoming extinct
